title: Recent Advances in Fe, Mo Based Electrocatalysts for Nitrogen Reduction Under Ambient Conditions
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00471J, Communication
Xiaoyu Li, Yutong Yang, Qin Ding, Yin Wang
Electrochemical nitrogen reduction reaction (NRR) is an efficient technology to replace the Haber-Bosch process to realize the transform from N2 to NH3 with the sustainable electricity under ambient conditions. However,...
